tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE delivery_vehicles (
	delivery_vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_name TEXT,
	current_location POINT,
	last_update TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance_km DECIMAL(10,2),
    route_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE route_points (
    point_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    point_sequence INT,
    point_lat FLOAT,
    point_long FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES DeliveryVehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE OperatorDetails (
    operator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    operator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES DeliveryVehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LocationUpdates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    new_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES DeliveryVehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_checked TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES DeliveryVehicles(vehicle_id)
);
